legend: Hypha Worker Co-operative Inc. was incorporated as a worker co-operative on August 1, 2019, in Ontario, Canada.
We held our first AGM on May 30-31, 2020.
We published resources and held open office hours to assist our neighbours with transitioning to virtual workplaces during COVID-19.
We launched Distributed.Press and its sister project, COMPOST Magazine.
We started our initial work in the Cosmos ecosystem.
We completed our first piece of work on the Starling Lab initiative.
We welcomed our first full-time contractors, who six months later became Hyphaâ€™s first employees and later our first cohort of members beyond founders.
All of the remaining founding members began working full-time at the cooperative.
Roo was born into the care of the collective Hypha wallets (and hearts).
We welcomed HEK as a client and started sharpening our focus on connecting arts and culture organizations with decentralized tech and tools.
We stayed local for our yearly retreat, spending a week on Toronto Island to talk governance, plan, and strategize for the coming year.
We unlocked another level of retreat planning, with activities including an Ikebana workshop and a team-building Dragon Boating outing.
